hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "If Adam's son had a valley full of gold, he would like to have two valleys, for nothing fills his mouth except dust. And Allah forgives him who repents to Him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُتَّقَى مِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْمَالِ
chapter.eng-name: The Fitnah of wealth should be warded off
